objects.text:
• Premium Gold-Plated Finish
• Double Row Pearl Design
• Unique Wave Structure
• Perfect for All Occasions

product_details.name: Elegant Pearl-Adorned Gold Wave Hoop Earrings - Timeless Luxury
product_details.description:
• Premium gold-plated finish with high-gloss shine
• Double row of delicate pearl embellishments
• Unique wave design for sophisticated style
• Comfortable curved hoop structure
• Perfect blend of classic and contemporary design
• Ideal for both formal and casual occasions
• Secure post back closure
• Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear
• Elegant mirror reflection effect in display
• Exquisite craftsmanship with attention to detail
• Versatile accessory that complements any outfit
• Makes a perfect gift for special occasions

banner_details:
This banner has a luxurious and elegant aesthetic designed to promote a premium jewelry product. The layout features a high-contrast split background: a light cream on the upper half blending into a muted gold-beige base on the lower half. The top-left corner holds a bold headline (`heading`) and a stylish serif subheading (`subheading`) to evoke sophistication. A refined bullet-point list (`description`) follows, highlighting features like material and design. The right side showcases a reflective product image (`product_image`) prominently. At the bottom left, the pricing (`price`) is displayed in bold, followed by a rectangular highlighted call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with the label (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Cream (#F9F3E9)
- Warm Beige (#E8D5B5)
- Rich Brown (#8B4513)
- Gold Ochre (#C7913D)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Accent Gold (#D4AF37)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings that blend gold and pearl tones to create a luxurious aesthetic. The dominant color is a reflective **metallic gold** (#D4AF37), giving the earrings a rich and regal appeal. The embedded **pearl white** beads (#F8F8FF) add sophistication and contrast, enhancing the visual richness. Subtle **shadow accents** in **charcoal gray** (#4B4B4B) and **soft highlight glows** in **creamy beige** (#FAF3E0) allow the gold and pearls to stand out without looking flat. These colors are blended smoothly, with the high-shine gold and delicate pearls complementing each other. Ideal palette: #D4AF37, #F8F8FF, #FAF3E0, #4B4B4B.
